content: Asian markets plunged while oil prices briefly hit five-month highs on Monday as investors anxiously awaited Tehran's next move after the United States joined Israel in attacking Iran's nuclear facilities, escalating the Middle East crisis.

title: Sensex Down 800 Points As US Bombing On Iran Escalates Middle East Crisis
content: Indian equities crashed in early trade after the US bombing of three Iranian nuclear sites heightened the Middle East crisis. Sensex was down over 600 points as the markets opened this morning. Nifty was 180 points in the red.

title: Putin Was Asked Why Russia Is Not Helping Iran. His Reply
content: While Russia and Iran have had close ties for decades, Putin said he is trying to stay neutral in the conflict as a large number of Russian-speaking people live in Israel.

content: A fire broke out on the set of a serial at the Film City in Mumbai on Monday morning, civic officials said.

title: UP Man Electrocuted While Fixing A Fan
content: A man was electrocuted while he was trying to fix a fan at his home in Deoria district of Uttar Pradesh, police said on Monday.

content: Iran's Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, in his first reaction after the US bombed Tehran's three key nuclear facilities, said the punishment for the "Zionist enemy" will continue.

title: "Not Fit To Fly, Go Stitch Shoes": IndiGo Pilot Alleges Casteism At Work
content: Alleging casteist insults at work, a trainee pilot with IndiGo has accused three senior officials of telling him that he was "not fit to fly a plane" and "must stitch shoes" instead

title: Jagan Mohan Reddy Named As Accused After His Car Runs Over Man
content: YSRCP chief and former Chief Minister YS Jagan Mohan Reddy has been named as an accused in a fatal road accident that allegedly occurred when he was on his way to Rentapalla village in Palnadu district recently, a police official said on Sunday.

title: Videos: Elon Musk's Tesla Starts Long-Awaited Robotaxi Service
content: Tesla Inc. rolled out its long-promised driverless taxi service to a handful of riders Sunday, a modest debut for what Elon Musk sees as a transformative new business line.

title: Israel-Iran War LIVE Updates: US Urges China To Stop Iran From Shutting Strait of Hormuz As Oil Prices Surge
content: US-Israel-Iran Conflict LIVE Updates: The United States carried out a "very successful attack" on three nuclear sites in Iran, President Donald Trump said.

title: Democrats Divided Over Iran Strikes, Demand Vote In Trump's War Powers
content: Democrats bristled Sunday over US President Donald Trump's decision to launch air strikes on Iran without seeking authorisation from Congress, accusing the Republican of violating the constitution and demanding a vote to rein in his war powers.

title: Rajasthan Government Transfers 62 IAS Officers, 11 Collectors
content: In a major bureaucratic reshuffle, the Rajasthan government has transferred 62 IAS officers, including eight Additional Chief Secretaries and 11 district collectors.

title: Decoy plan, 125 planes: How US carried out largest B-2 strike in history
content: In a daring operation dubbed 'Midnight Hammer,' U.S. stealth bombers executed a surprise strike on Iran's underground nuclear facilities. Seven B-2 Spirit bombers, supported by fighter jets and aerial tankers, flew a 37-hour round trip to deliver a devastating blow to Iran's uranium enrichment program.

title: 'Bullseye': Trump hails op Midnight Hammer, says 'monumental damage' done to Iran
content: Donald Trump claimed that recent US airstrikes, dubbed 'Operation Midnight Hammer,' inflicted significant damage on Iran's nuclear facilities. He asserted that satellite imagery confirms the obliteration of nuclear sites, particularly the Fordow facility, targeted with Massive Ordnance Penetrators. Trump emphasized the unique capability of the US military in executing such a complex operation.

title: Bumrah makes WTC history, becomes first seamer to reach huge milestone
content: Jasprit Bumrah etched his name in cricket history during the first Test against England, securing his 11th five-wicket haul in the World Test Championship, equaling Ravichandran Ashwin's record. He also became the first Asian player to claim 150 Test wickets in SENA countries, surpassing Wasim Akram.

title: Elon Musk‚Äôs simple life: World‚Äôs richest says will never own 5 things
content: Elon Musk, despite his immense wealth, maintains a surprisingly minimalist lifestyle. He sold numerous properties, opting for a small Boxabl home and even crashing at friends' places. Musk once lived on $1 a day and famously crashed a McLaren, never replacing it, showcasing his detachment from luxury possessions and focus on his ventures.

title: 'Big mistake': Khamenei again warns Israel of 'punishment'; no mention of US strike
content: Ayatollah Khamenei warned Israel of punishment amidst US strikes on Iranian nuclear facilities, though he didn't directly mention the US action. Iran vowed a proportionate response, potentially targeting US bases, and accused the US of sabotaging diplomacy. Trump defended the strikes, hinting at regime change, while Israel claimed progress in eliminating Iran's nuclear capabilities.

title: Price prediction: What's gold rate outlook for June 23 week amid Israel-Iran war- buy or sell?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices experienced volatility last week amid escalating geopolitical tensions between Iran and Israel, coupled with a steady dollar. Gold prices are expected to trade sideways to positive, with support at ‚Çπ97,000-‚Çπ98,000 and resistance at ‚Çπ100,000-‚Çπ100,100.

title: Wake-up call for US: Elon Musk echoes brother on Trump‚Äôs ‚ÄòBig Beautiful Bill‚Äô; here‚Äôs how
content: Elon Musk warns that China's solar power generation is rapidly expanding, potentially exceeding the entire US electricity output within four years. This concern follows Kimbal Musk's criticism of a proposed bill, arguing it would cripple the US renewable energy sector and jeopardize American energy independence, forcing reliance on natural gas.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 dips below 24,900; BSE Sensex tanks over 800 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, tanked in opening trade on Monday following global cues. While Nifty50 went below 25,000, BSE Sensex was down over 600 points.

title: 'Wow, a lot...': How Bill Gates reacted when daughter announced her startup
content: Phoebe Gates, daughter of Bill Gates, has launched Phia, an e-commerce app co-founded with Sophia Kianni. The platform utilizes AI to compare prices across numerous websites, offering users a comprehensive view of both new and second-hand fashion items. Bill Gates initially expressed concern about potential financial requests and involvement but ultimately supported Phoebe's entrepreneurial endeavor.

title: IND vs ENG: Could Pant face ICC ban after heated clash over ball change?
content: Rishabh Pant faces potential ICC sanctions after an on-field incident at Headingley. Pant's frustration over an umpire's decision regarding a ball change request led to a heated exchange and him throwing the ball in protest. Former coach Ravi Shastri attributed Pant's actions to frustration, while co-commentator Mark Butcher questioned the need for such behavior.

title: Fire erupts on 'Anupamaa' Set: Halts shoot at Goregaon Film City; no casualties reported
content: A fire erupted on the set of the popular TV show Anupamaa in Mumbai's Film City early Monday morning, causing significant damage. The All Indian Cine Workers Association confirmed the set was destroyed, but thankfully, no casualties were reported. The incident occurred before the scheduled shoot, with crew members present.

title: Honeymoon murder: Raja Raghuvanshi's bag destroyed; auto driver link in probe
content: In the Raja Raghuvanshi murder case, Shillong police, aided by Indore Crime Branch, recovered the charred remains of a bag linked to the crime from a vacant plot. Accused Silom, a property dealer, admitted to burning the bag with the help of Balvindar, a security guard.

title: NASA spots Japan‚Äôs Resilience crash site: High-res image shows impact, private moon missions struggle
content: NASA's Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter has spotted the crash site of Japan's Resilience moon lander. The ispace lander aimed for a historic landing in Mare Frigoris. Communication was lost during descent. The image shows a dark smudge, indicating a high-speed impact. A microrover carrying art was also lost. This marks ispace's second failed lunar landing.

title: IND vs ENG: Pant‚Äôs ‚Äòapne chauke ke chakkar mein‚Ä¶‚Äô quip to Jadeja leaves everyone laughing - watch video
content: India and England are locked in a thrilling first Test at Headingley, marked by Pant's century and Bumrah's record-equalling five-wicket haul. England responded strongly, but India fought back, setting up a tense Day 4. With India leading by 96 runs, the match hangs in the balance, promising more drama as weather and aggressive batting add to the excitement.

title: NBA Champions: Shai Gilgeous‚ÄëAlexander clinches title; Leads thunder to historic Game7 title
content: Oklahoma City Thunder secured their first NBA title since 2008, defeating the Indiana Pacers 103-91 in Game 7. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, named Finals MVP, led the Thunder with 29 points. Gilgeous-Alexander also achieved the rare feat of winning both regular season and Finals MVP. The Thunder's victory marks a historic moment, showcasing their dominant season and young, championship-caliber roster.

title: 'Bustling with activity': Omar Abdullah hails 'revival' of tourism in Pahalgam
content: Omar Abdullah reports a resurgence in Kashmir tourism. Pahalgam, once deserted, now thrives with tourists and locals. This revival follows a terror attack in April. Efforts to restore tourism are yielding positive results. Abdullah expresses satisfaction with the progress. The region is experiencing renewed activity and interest. The return of tourists signals a positive shift for the local economy.

title: Adin Ross returns with Brand Risk 008: Date, full fight card revealed
content: Adin Ross is set to host Brand Risk 008 in Nashville on June 22, 2025, featuring a main event between Charleston White and Kodiyakredd. The event, streamed live on Kick, includes nine influencer matchups with personalities like Scam Likely, Julian Newman, and Supreme Patty. Following a chaotic Brand Risk 007, expect more drama and unexpected moments.

title: 'She's heartbroken': Blake Lively breaks down as Taylor Swift cuts ties
content: The friendship between Blake Lively and Taylor Swift has ended. Sources say Lively is heartbroken after Swift cut ties. Legal issues involving Justin Baldoni's case add complexity. Lively must submit texts with Swift. Rumors suggest Lively tried to leverage her Swift connection. Travis Kelce supports Swift during this difficult time. Swift's upcoming album may reflect themes of betrayal.

title: NBA trade rumors: Bulls eye $60M Celtics star Kristaps Porzingis; 3-team deal may save Boston $140M
content: Fresh off their NBA championship, the Boston Celtics face a crucial offseason decision regarding Kristaps Porzingis. Trading him could save the team up to $140 million in luxury tax, offering long-term financial flexibility. However, losing Porzingis would weaken their frontcourt and potentially diminish their 2025 title chances, forcing a difficult choice between immediate contention and future sustainability.

title: Watch: B-2 bombers land in US after strikes on Iranian nuclear facilities
content: US B-2 Spirit bombers, returning to Missouri's Whiteman Air Force base, concluded a 36-hour mission in the CENTCOM area. As part of 'Operation Midnight Hammer,' seven stealth aircraft executed a precision strike on Iranian nuclear facilities, deploying 30,000-pound bunker-buster bombs. American officials claim the mission devastated Iran's nuclear program, while Iran denies significant damage and vows retaliation, escalating regional tensions.

title: 'Why wouldn't there be a regime change?': Trump drops 'hint' after US hits n-sites in Iran
content: Donald Trump seemingly endorsed regime change in Iran, questioning why it wouldn't occur if the current regime fails to improve the nation. This contrasts with his administration's earlier statements, where officials like JD Vance, Marco Rubio, and Pete Hegseth asserted that the recent US air strikes on Iranian nuclear sites were not aimed at toppling the government.

title: Double trouble: AI asked to remove 3 crew officials & gets show-cause for violating pilot flying hour norms
content: Following the tragic Air India Flight AI-171 crash in Ahmedabad, the Directorate General of Civil Aviation has directed Air India to remove three senior officials from crew scheduling roles. The crash, involving a Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner, resulted in 241 fatalities.

title: US issues 'worldwide caution' as Iran vows 'proportionate' response to strikes
content: Following US military strikes on Iran's nuclear facilities, a global security alert has been issued for American citizens. The State Department, citing potential reprisals, ordered non-essential staff to leave Lebanon and issued advisories for T√ºrkiye and Saudi Arabia. Iran has vowed a 'proportionate response,' raising fears of a wider conflict as Israeli air raids continue and Tehran threatens US allies.

title: Punjab horror: Property dealer shoots wife, teenage son, dies by suicide
content: In a tragic incident near Changera village, Sandeep Singh Rajpal allegedly shot his wife, Mandeep Kaur, and their son, Abhay, before committing suicide. The bodies were discovered inside their SUV by workers near Banur-Tepla road. Police found a pistol in Sandeep's hand and are investigating the motive, though mental health issues of the son are known.

title: Karisma Kapoor joins Sunjay Kapur‚Äôs wife in prayer meet; Kareena, Saif and others offer support
content: Karisma Kapoor was seen offering prayers alongside Priya Sachdev, the current wife of her late ex-husband Sunjay Kapur, at an emotional prayer meet held in Delhi. The solemn gathering took place on June 22 at the Taj Palace Hotel, following Sunjay‚Äôs untimely demise on June 12 during a polo match in England. He was 53.

title: IND vs ENG: Manjrekar forgets Kohli as Gill‚Äôs celebration sparks d√©j√† vu!- Watch
content: Shubman Gill, in his Test captaincy debut, displayed a passionate leadership style reminiscent of Virat Kohli during the match against England. His animated celebration after a perceived dismissal of Joe Root, later overturned by DRS, sparked commentary about his transformed on-field demeanor.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for the week starting June 23- check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Motilal Oswal Financial Services recommends Larsen & Toubro and Trent as top stock picks for the week starting June 23, 2025. L&T's international order growth and focus on new sectors are expected to drive revenue. Trent anticipates substantial growth, capitalizing on India's expanding retail market and its unique market position.

title: Brook becomes latest to join cricket‚Äôs unlucky 99 club against India -full list
content: Harry Brook faced disappointment at Headingley, becoming the first batter in three years to be dismissed on 99 during the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy Test against India. Despite Brook's near-century, England's innings concluded at 465, granting India a narrow six-run lead. By the end of Day 3, India reached 90/2, holding a 96-run lead as they head into Day 4.

title: NBA Finals: Tyrese Haliburton suffers crushing injury before halftime lead; Pacers lose momentum as stars
content: Tyrese Haliburton's devastating leg injury in the NBA Finals Game 7 against the OKC Thunder has sent shockwaves through the NBA. Several NBA stars, including Josh Hart, Karl-Anthony Towns, Vince Carter, and Stephen A. Smith, reacted with prayers and dismay. Haliburton's absence, confirmed by the Pacers, significantly impacted Indiana's title hopes, placing pressure on Pascal Siakam to lead the team.

title: IND vs ENG: Give Bumrah a special contract, says Dinesh Karthik - Watch
content: Jasprit Bumrah's exceptional performance at Headingley, marked by a stunning 5-83, has sparked widespread acclaim. Dinesh Karthik lauded Bumrah as a 'national treasure,' advocating for a special BCCI contract recognizing his unparalleled value. Despite dropped catches, Bumrah's spell kept India in the game.

title: Sitaare Zameen Par box office collection day 3: Aamir Khan‚Äôs film falls short of Rs 60cr mark
content: Aamir Khan's 'Sitaare Zameen Par' had a promising opening weekend at the Indian box office, earning an estimated Rs 59.90 crore. Driven by positive reviews and family appeal, the film showed strong growth over the weekend. It has become Aamir Khan's 9th highest-grossing film, while also marking a career milestone for Genelia Deshmukh as her highest-grossing film to date.

title: 2 coaches get jail terms for sexual assault on judo players
content: In Meerut, a judo coach, Manish alias Max, was sentenced to life imprisonment for raping a 10-year-old national judo player. Similarly, in Moradabad, Mohd Qasim Ali received a 15-year sentence for sexually assaulting a 12-year-old boy under the guise of judo training in 2017. Both cases involved betrayal of trust and resulted in severe penalties for the perpetrators.

title: Way-Too-Early Power Rankings for 2025-26: A dynasty coming in OKC?

title: Ranking the Premier League's ¬£100m transfers after Wirtz
content: the 22-year-old midfielder will become only the fifth player to move to (or within) the premier league for over ¬£100m . arne slot convinced Florian Wirtz to chose Liverpool over other rivals . we rank the previous four based on how successful they've been .

title: LSU's latest MCWS title makes the Tigers college baseball's best of all time
content: the LSU Tigers beat Coastal Carolina with a big double play to take home the men's college world series . the title they really won was that of Greatest Ever College Baseball Program . "when we go to work every day, we do it trying to make the Tigers that came before us proud," says a designated hitter .
